name: Israeli Couscous and Quinoa Salad
author: Pixelsicle
summary: A really light and delicious cold salad. You can use the vegetables shown here or get creative and add what you like, but the broth really is a must.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
1 ear fresh white corn, kernels cut from cob
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine chicken broth, Israeli couscous, and quinoa in a saucepan
Reduce heat to low and simmer until broth is absorbed, about 10 minutes
Gently spread out and let cool completely, about 15 minutes
Fluff with a fork until incorporated
Add corn, spring onions, red bell pepper, parsley, garlic salt, salt, and pepper
Serve immediately or refrigerate until well chilled
